page.title: 07Churchgoing in Knowle
page.content: There are 6 churches attended by people in the area although 2 of the churches are just outside the area. (Methodist and Roman Catholic). Knowle Parish Church was built in 1402 and is attended by 350 people. St. George and St. Theresa R.C. Church in Dorridge was built in 1935 and 500 people attend Mass. Dorridge Methodist Church was built in 1965 and 240 people attend. The United Reformed Church was built in 1932 and 50/60 people attend although the church can hold 250 people. Widney Tree Church is attended by 40 people and was built in 1962. Finally St. James Church, Bentley Heath (the primary school hall) was opened in September 1982 and is attended by 50 adults and 25 children.
